mapper.select:
select * from lecture_info where lectureNo > 0 and lectureState = 1
and lectureNo in (select lectureNo from lecture_hierarchy where hierarchyNo in (select hierarchyNo from hierarchy_table where courseNo in (select courseNo from course_table where courseName = #{courseName})
and categoryNo in (select categoryNo from category_table where categoryName = #{categoryName})
and skillNo in (select skillNo from skill_table where skillName in ( #{skill} ))
))
order by lectureNo desc, lectureOpenDate desc
select c.courseNo, courseName from hierarchy_table as h left join course_table as c on h.courseNo = c.courseNo group by courseNo order by 1

select c.courseNo, courseName, a.categoryNo, categoryName from hierarchy_table as h left join course_table as c on h.courseNo = c.courseNo left join category_table as a on h.categoryNo = a.categoryNo group by courseNo, categoryNo order by 1, 3

select courseName, categoryName, skillName from hierarchy_table as h left join course_table as c on h.courseNo = c.courseNo left join category_table as a on h.categoryNo = a.categoryNo left join skill_table as s on h.skillNo = s.skillNo group by courseName, categoryName, skillName order by 1, 2, 3
select * from lecture_info where lectureName = #{lectureName} and lectureNo > 0 and lectureState = 1 order by lectureNo desc, lectureOpenDate desc
